column4: yes follow what DasEi says, or go to aystem>admin>system logs> kern.log

I've poured over the logs for a while. At first I thought it was pulseaudio, because the log files around the time of crashes was ending with numerous pulse errors. Now, there are no pulse errors, but it still panics

I posted a reply under this: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/479296 , and followed the instructions to install "linux-backports-modules-alsa-karmic-generic". The errors in the launchpad were pretty much exactly what my logs were saying 3 days ago
